## Scripting class

[https://drafts.csswg.org/mediaqueries-5/\#mf-scripting](https://drafts.csswg.org/mediaqueries-5/#mf-scripting)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Scripting implements Equatable, Hashable, Serializable 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [Equatable](./alfa-equatable.equatable_interface.md)<!-- -->, [Hashable](./alfa-hash.hashable_interface.md)<!-- -->, [Serializable](./alfa-json.serializable_interface.md)

## Remarks

As noted in Media Queries Level 5, a future level of CSS may extend the scripting feature to allow fine-grained detection of which script is allowed to run. While the `Scripting` class therefore currently seems very sparse, we foresee a need to extend it in the future.
